I am an associate professor of Finance & Data Science at <a href="https://www.em-lyon.com/en/" target="_blank">em**lyon business school**</a>. My research interests revolve around applications of **numerical methods** in various fields (**financial economics** mostly). Some of my recent work focuses on **supervised learning** and on **sustainable equity investing**.
